meanings.definition: A repeated match or competition between the same opponents.
meanings.sent1: The two teams had multiple rematches throughout the season.
meanings.sent2: Fans enjoy watching rematches between their favorite teams.
meanings.sent3: The constant rematches between the two rivals kept everyone on the edge of their seats.
meanings.sent4: In the world of boxing, rematches can often be more intense than the first fight.
meanings.sent5: The concept of rematches adds excitement and anticipation to sports events.

meanings.definition: To have a second match or competition against the same opponent.
meanings.sent1: After losing the first game, the team wants to rematches for a chance at redemption.
meanings.sent2: She rematches her opponent in the final round of the tournament.
meanings.sent3: The player jokingly challenges their friend to rematches in video games.
meanings.sent4: The tennis player rematches her rival in a thrilling showdown.
meanings.sent5: He always rematches his sister in board games to prove he can win.
